name: High Factory
description:
This game was made by one person in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 42 game jam. The theme for this jam was "Running out of space".

I tried to make something like Factorio in very limited space. I had a lot of ideas, but too few time to implement them all. The result is some kind of a survival sandbox game with a bit of progression, because I had no time left to add a proper story.

If you want to have some fun, try to complete this challenges:

  • Craft stone tools
  • Craft iron tools
  • Create auto miners for coal and iron ore
  • Automate iron mining and iron ingots creation (iron and coal miners -> conveyors -> furnace -> conveyor -> crate)
  • Craft launch pad and launch items across islands
  • Unlock all islands
  • Automate all resources (iron ingots, stone, wood)
  • HARD: Place 3 crates for all resources at the last island and transport resources into them by conveyors (post screenshots if you did it)
